betterquesting.desc:
Okay. Okay okay, those �lwood tools�r aren't the best. Kinda weak. Weak but...sturdy? Brittle? Sevicable! Let's go with that term! Anyways, I need more samples! Lets get some samples of the local §5§lrocks§r. You might have to dig around in some §5§lgravel§r for more samples, too.
    In return, I'll send the last of the §2§lField Kit§r! Well, not the MRE, yuck. I put in part of my §2§llunch§r for you instead.

display:10.Name:8: Any Cobblestone
Ferret Field Tunic

betterquesting.name: Material Matters
betterquesting.desc:
Okay, so I checked out that soil. Very soily. Very good. Rich, even! There should probably be plantlife around you. Anything resembling a §ltree§r? Wait, actual §ltrees§r? Excellent, excellent! This is great! Go knock one down and make some §5§ltools§r for me! No better way to see the quality of materials you have.   
    I think I've found a few more pieces of the §2§lField Kit§r as well! They should help replace the tools you're sending me.
---------------------------------------------
    §oWhen you open your inventory, you should have a large panel of items to the right. This is §4§l§oNot Enough Items (NEI)§r§o, which allows you to search through the thousands of items in this modpack, and find out what the recipe is for them. Use the black search bar at the bottom, and then you can §l§nLeft Click§r §oon an item(or highlight it and hit §l§nR§r §o) to the right to see how to make it!

betterquesting.desc:
Oh oh, there you are! Good, is good, this is working good. I'm §3§lBiologist Bitsy§r. The §lQUEST Tablet§r scanner shows that your place is BIIIG. Big big, yes. This is good! Can you grab me a few samples? §5§lDirt§r and §5§lsand§r and §5§lgravel§r and stuff. Stuff is good! You can use your mitts to gather the basic stuff to start with. 
    I have a few spare pieces of a §2§lField Kit§r you can have. I'll find more for you while you search around...
    Oh! Also, here, have a §2§lJob Chip§r. §3§lRecruiter Rodney§r can explain them better after we get you situated, sound good?

display:10.Name:8: Ferret Field Pants
Ferret Field Boots

betterquesting.name: Technology Research
betterquesting.desc:
I did some deeper scans of the §lmetal§r and §lore§r from earlier. Super interesting! It seems theres a lot more §lmetal§r out there. Not just §lmetal§r, either! A wide variety of great materials! Sharper! Heavier! Stronger! Faster! Other than §liron§r, there seem to be two other common §5§lmetals§r there. 
    Our §3§lResearch and Development Division§r would like a sample of these, please!

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Rolling the Dice
betterquesting.desc:
Bandit, I know you haven't been with §3§lThe Ferret Business§r long (thus starting in the ah...more questionable experimental labs...) so you hadn't earned access to the§3§l Corporate Shop§r yet. Now that you have earned it, let me show you one of §3§lThe Business'§r biggest sellers : §lThe Blind Bag of Blind Bags§r!! Inside this can either be one of hundreds of different items or... Another �lblind bag�r! No, not another one of THESE, that'd be recursive recursive recursive! No, instead you'll get one of the OTHER §lBlind Bags§r we make! These contain so many more items that, well...last I looked at our internal records, we had so many different §lBlind Bags§r, it'd make your head spin! Last week I found a bar of §lGold§r in one. §lGold§r! Here, I'll sell you a §2§lBlind Bag§r at a heavy discount.
    The §lBBoBB§r comes in five tiers : Basic, §2Good§r, §1Great§r, §6Epic§r, and §5Legendary§r! Regular§l Blind Bags§r come in four tiers as well : Cheap, §2Decent§r, §1Good§r, and §5Amazing§r. The higher tier of §lBBoBB§r you open, the higher tier of §lBlind Bag§r you'll get as well.
    Personally, I think the §2§lBasic BBoBB§r is the best, as it has a chance of containing ANY §lBlind Bag§r we offer! 
    If you've lost your §lcoins§r from a mishap...well, the §3§lGeneral Store§r should be open. Listen to §3§lProprieter Penny's§r spiel, and she should open up the rest of the §3§lCorporate Shop§r to you... including §3§lSupply and Demand§r, which can be very...lucrative.
    Oh, if you lost your §lTFB Corporate Catalogue§r, you can fashion a makeshift one with a §lBook§r and some §lString§r, and the §lQUEST Tablet§r will detect it and exchange it for the proper device.

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Its The Name of the Game
betterquesting.desc:
So, I analyzed all those §lrocks§r and stuff you sent me. I found traces of §lmetals§r. Lots of §lmetals§r. Lots and lots of different §lmetals§r! §lMetals§r are useful! You can make better §ltools§r! And probably better §larmor§r and stuff too.
    Get me some samples of the unrefined §5§lIron Ore§r, as well as shaped samples (A §5§lpick§r and a §5§lsword§r should do fine), and I'll give you access to §3§lThe Corporate Shop§r via the §2§lTFB Corporate Catalogue§r. I'll also give you some §2§lIron§r back since I'm not sure of the quality of your §5§lIron§r yet. Or you can take some extra §2§lcoins§r instead, it's up to you!
----------------------------------------
    §oYou can harvest large sections of §ltrees§r§o and §lore veins§r§o with §4§l§oVeinminer§r§o. Simply hold down §l§n§oSneak§r§o (default §l§n§oShift§r§o) when harvesting things with an appropriate §l§otool§r§o to activate it, which will take damage as if you had harvested each block one at a time.

betterquesting.name: Natural Research
betterquesting.desc:
Okay. Okay yes. The tablet's scanners show a whole abundance of life all around you. This is good. It means you won't starve cause you can eat some of it! But it's also bad. Cause some of it can eat you! The entire corporate wing I work in is very interested in what living things you can find.  
    Get me some §5§lbiological stuff§r and I'll pass around my findings.

betterquesting.desc: You know, I think that it might benefit you if I got you in contact with a few specific engineers here... You being alone means you would benefit greately by utilizing some special mechanical §lmachines§r! I think showing them some standard mechanical §lmaterials§r and supplies would catch their attention!

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Factory Beltline
betterquesting.desc:
Now, I've mentioned that the Heart of MFR is the Factory Block, and the Veins are Plastic Pipes, right? Well, welcome to the Digestive System! A factory sorts, processes, utilizes, and discards waste materials constantly, just like a digestive system does. 
    Conveyor Belts can move Items, Creatures, and even Assistants around! You can change their direction with a Precision Sledgehammer, which ca also be used to rotate it upward to create an Escalator. Going too slow? Right click some Glowstone Dust onto a belt. You can also color belts with Ceramic Dye. 
    If you want to move around your belts without being dragged along, make yourself a pair of Plastic Boots!
    When an item touches the Item Collector, whether it was dropped or pushed into it by a Conveyor Belt, it is picked up and placed into an adjacent inventory. The Collector will move items into the same inventory until it is full, then move to the next one. It chooses its inventory based on this order : Down, Up, North, South, West, East.
    Unlike the Item Collector, the Item Router is able to filter which side an item is pushed out of. Each color in the GUI corresponds with one side of the Machine. Items can be input into any side, but they cannot output upward, as the Item Router has the ability to pull an item off a Conveyor Belt that is on top of it, if it matches a filtered item in the GUI.
    Since your world is fairly magical, and we've noticed you come across many Magical items, we decided to create a specialized Router for you. You can use the Enchantment Router like an Item Router, but it will scan the magical Enchantments on an item, and allow you to sort that way.
    The Mob Router needs to be powered to work, but it can be configured to scan for specific creatures in front of it. It will then pull the creature and put it behind the machine.
    The Mob Counter scans a 5x5x5 cube in front of it, counting how many animals, monsters, and Assistants are there. It outputs a Redstone Signal with a strength based on how many it finds.
    The Unifier is used to unify various types of material, for example different Silver Ores. Items need to be piped into the top, and it will convert it to the first suitable item in the Ore Dictionary. Can place the item in the GUI you'd prefer it converted into.

display:10.Name:8: Good Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Magical Nature Research
betterquesting.desc: Many branches of research in §3§lThe Ferret Business§r explore natural magic. Nature, of course, can be much more mystical than people want to believe.

betterquesting.name: Natural Technology Research
betterquesting.desc: Nature has a great way of surviving and helping itself... but a little boost of technological research does wonders!

betterquesting.name: Magical Technology Research
betterquesting.desc: A match made in heavy, §3§lThe Ferret Business§r is especially interested in researching the combination of Magic and Technology.

betterquesting.name: {CRACKLING RADIO TRANSMISSION}
betterquesting.desc:
Hello?
    {§oCRACKLING NOISE§r}
    Hello? Is this...yes §3§lSkittles§r I see the flashing light. No, §3§lSkittles§r, don't to...
    {§oSTATIC§r}
    I said don't touch that! Oh, wait, that worked. Good job §3§lAssistant Skittles§r!
    Ahem. Greetings Assistant...uh....your name...I have it here somewhere...
    {§oPAPER RUSTLING§r}
    I'm going to give you a nickname! §d§lBandit§r! A classic ferret nickname, I believe.
    Um, yes. Right. You are the lucky survivor of our latest technological achievement : §3§lMulti-Dimensional Teleportation§r! Our scientists have been working on this for ages! We lost more than a few §lpersonnel§r and §llabs§r getting this perfected and...
    What? Oh right! My name is §3§lCaigan§r. I'm the §3§lCEO§r of §3§lThe Ferret Business§r. We §lbuy§r, §lsell§r, §lacquire§r, §lstockpile§r, and §lresearch§r anything and everything we can. I know you are a new kit to the §3§lFamily§r but I can already see the potential in you!
    We have no clue at all where you are. Hell, you may have even landed with some of the other test su...I mean, §3§lAssistants§r!
    You hold another great invention from §3§lThe Ferret Business§r: The §3§lQuestionable Universal Exploration and Study Transmitter§r, or §3§lQUEST Tablet§r. Well, more like an §le-reader§r really, with a built in §lminiature teleportation aparatus§r. It has built in §lscanners§r and a §ldatabase§r, and... well, we tried to §lteleport§r you home with it, but something is preventing us. We aren't sure what. But, I feel that right now, we have an amazing opportunity. Right now, you are potentially one of our §lGREATEST§r assets! Well, if you can prove it.
    We currently have no idea if the place you ended up is worth §linvesting§r in.  We're already getting a lot of data from your §3§lQUEST Tablet§r §lscanner§r, some of them very familiar, others very... alien. Using your §3§lTablet§r, you can send us §lmaterials§r and aid in our §lresearch§r of this new world, and in return you will be §lpaid§r and can use the §3§lCorporate Shop§r to purchase things to help you survive until we get you §lhome§r.
    So, are you ready, §d§lAssistant Bandit§r of §3§lThe Ferret Business§r? Lets get started!

     You must spend at least 3 §2§lShop Vouchers§r in one purchase to earn a §2§lShop Token§r. The smallest §3§lShop Token§r you can turn in is a §5§lBronze Shop Token§r. Larger value tokens can also earn you bonuses in the form of §5§lBlind Bags§r!

betterquesting.desc:
§o    This modpack utilizes the §4§lFTB Utilities Guide Book§r§o system. In your §linventory§r§o, on the left side, is a §lBook§r §oyou can click to bring up §3§l§oThe Ferret Business Guidebook§r§o.
    The book does not have much yet, but it will be filled out more with every update.
    Throughout §lquesting§r§o, important words will be highlighted in various ways : §r
    §3§lNames of people, places, or other things.§r
    §d§lYour Name§r
    §4§lMod Name§r
    §5§lItems for the current quest§r
    §2§lRewards for the current quest§r
    §lOther items, many times hints to the current quest§r
    §l§nKeypresses or commands§r

betterquesting.name: Explanation of Benefits
betterquesting.desc:
Nice to meet you, §d§lBandit§r. As I explained in my greeting, I am §3§lRecruiter Rodney§r, one of the heads of the §3§lFR Department§r here. §3§lCaigan§r has tasked me with working out how to do employee benefits with your... special situation. I am pleased to note that, working with other departments in The §3§lFerret Business§r, I have devised multiple systems that work around the... limited functionality of your §3§lQUEST Tablet§r teleporter.
    The first of which is handling how to get you better access to the §3§lCorporate Catalog§r and its §3§lShop Loyalty§r program : 
    1) To purchase items from the §3§lCorporate Catalog§r, you must use §2§lShop Vouchers§r.
    2) I will convert at an §3§lExchange Rate§r of 10 §5§lSilver Coins§r to 1 §2§lShop Voucher§r.
    3) Each purchase earns you a §lShop Token§r, depending on the value of the purchase.
    4) Collect and turn in §lShop Tokens§r for§3§l Shop Loyalty§r, earning you better §3§lExchange Rates§r.
    As well, when I give you a §2§lShop Voucher§r, I will also give you some §2§lExchange Tokens§r, equal to the rank of your §3§lShop Loyalty§r. I will explain how to use these elsewhere.

betterquesting.name: Better Tools
betterquesting.desc:
There are plenty of §ltools§r that can be made to §laid §rin the §lconstruction§r and running of an §lefficient factory§r, combined with the §lnatural magicalness§r of your §lmaterials§r that seems to lend them a bit of an increased §lfunction§r to some of them. This §lfunction§r is not always§r, how could we say it....
    §lLogical§r? Yeah, let's go with §llogical§r...
    The §5§lBarrel Hammer§r enables you to remove any §lUpgrade§r from a §lBetter Barrel§r. §l§nSneak + Right Click§r it on a§l Barrel§r to start removing §lupgrades§r. You can §lcycle§r through specific §lUpgrades§r by §l§nSneak + Right Clicking§r the §5§lBarrel Hammer§r when §lnot aiming§r at anything.
    §5§lDollies§r enable you to move§l Better Barrels§r or other §lChests§r and some complicated §lmachinery§r without losing §lcontents§r or §lsettings§r. §l§nSneak + Right Click§r the §5§lDolly§r onto the §lBarrel§r, §lChest§r, or §lMachine§r, and if it can it will §lpick it up§r. You'll §lwalk slowly§r as you §lcarry§r it, but you can then §l§nSneak + Right Click§r the §5§lDolly§r onto the new spot you want to §lplace§r the item. The §5§lDiamond Dolly§r works like the regular §5§lDolly§r, but it can also be used to §lmove Monster Spawners§r. Doing so will slowly §ldamage§r the §5§lDolly§r though, keep in mind!

betterquesting.name: Bagging Up Coins
betterquesting.desc:
As you do more and more §lresearch§r and §lsell§r more §lmaterials§r to §3§lThe Business§r, I expect you'll have a whole lot of §5§lSilver Coins§r. If you want, I can easily §2§lBag§r them up for you. It makes storing them much easier. 
    Now that you know this, I will note you can also put them into an §4§lEnder IO§r §3§lSAG Mill§r to automatically bag them for you.
    To retrieve the §5§lSilver Coins§r, hold the §2§lBag of Coins§r and §l§nRight Click§r, or you can craft the bag back into 50 §5§lSilver Coins§r.

betterquesting.name: Auto Exchange
betterquesting.desc:
See those Exchange Tokens I just gave you? Well, since I forsee us exchanging a whole lot of money soon, I had to work out a temporary solution, as constantly sending things your QUEST Tablet could get... tedious.
    To that end, I've convinced Engineer Erin of the EnderI/O lab to add a little extra to his Alloy Smelter and SAG Mill designs. With the Alloy Smelter, you can put in one of these Exchange Tokens and the appropriate amount of Silver Coins, and it will ship them to me, and send back a Shop Voucher. (Proprieter Penny will cover the SAG Mill in your Corporate Catalog)
    Once you have an Exchange Token, you can duplicate them easily by placing one alone in most any Crafting Grid. They are useless without Silver Coins to exchange as well, so...
    This is only temporary until we can design a set of machines specifically for this... unique... situation.

betterquesting.name: Better Factory Tools
betterquesting.desc:
There are plenty of tools that can be made to aid in the construction and running of an efficient factory,  combined with the natural magicalness of your materials that seems to lend them a bit of an increased function to some of them. This function is not always, how could we say it... Logical? Yeah, let's go with logical...
    You can cook up Sugar into a form of Sugar Charcoal, if you are low on normal Coal or Charcoal. You can also form it into a Sugar Charcoal Block.
    When placed, you can Right Click more Vine Scaffolding onto it to automatically place them on top of the stack. The sides can be climbed like a ladder. When a Scaffold is broken, all Scaffolds above it automatically break too.
    The Needlegun was originally a tool used by animal control to administer sedatives to a rampaging animal... we've taken it, and modified a bit into a defensive weapon for you. There are a lot of different types of Ammo you can use with it. Right clicking it will allow you to load Ammo, and Right Clicking it again will fire it. When the Needlegun Magazine is empty, Right Clicking will eject the spent Mag and reload the same Ammo type if you have more in your inventory, otherwise it will have you manually choose a new Ammo. 
    There are many Needlegun Ammo types : 
      Needles and Shrapnel are standard ammo. 
      Fire ignites both creatures and wood on fire. 
      Anvil fires an anvil at target, and can be used like a normal Anvil afterward.
      Lava drops a bit of Lava on the ground, but will not catch Wood on fire. 
      Sludge drops a bit of Sludge, causing Weakness, Wither, and Nausea. 
      Sewage drops Sewage, causing Hunger, Slowness, and Poison.
    DetCord doesn't seem to work like it does back home. The only use we've found so far is... in making this Fishing Rod. Wait, be careful! Only use it in a safe area, away from important things like machines and other Assistants... it'll be kind of like Dynamite Fishing.
    Kind of...

betterquesting.name: The Power of Infusion
betterquesting.desc:
Alchemical creations and Arcane Worktable constructions can only harness so much magical potential. For the big, fun stuff, we're going to have to get into Infusion Rituals. The start of this research can be found on the Artifice tab of your Thauminomicon. Just a fair warning : This is a very involved process. It will require using your Alchemical Distillation techhniques, and can be very dangerous if not done correctly. I'll do my best to explain things, but you should always read your Thauminomicon closely!
    You'll want a large, open area for this. I mean big, at least 10x10 if not larger. Also, be sure its in a safe location, because failure can be... catastrophic. Just a fair warning! You will need 4 Arcane Stone Blocks, 4 Arcane Stone Bricks, an Arcane Pedestal, and a Runic Matrix. Just to make things easier, make a total of 9 Arcane Pedestals, as you'll need them. Follow the layout in your Thauminomicon. Keep in mind, there is an empty space between the center Pedestal and the Runic Matrix above it. 
    When ready, Right Click your Wand on the Matrix (if it has enough Vis of all the Aspects!) to construct the Infusion Altar. It should very obviously change.
    Now, as I said, Infusion is powerful and dangerous. Before we do the first infusion, we should reduce what is called Instability. The more powerful an item you are infusing, the more Instability it has when doing the Infusion Ritual. You can reduce Instability by placing certain magical objects around the Infusion Altar. Candles, Skulls, and Crystals are the most common.
    Any item you place needs to be counterbalanced on the opposite side. If you place a Candle three blocks North of the center, place another one three blocks South. For even more stabilty, place two more to the East and West as well! To start, I suggest gathering four White Tallow Candles, two Zombie Heads, and two Skeleton Skulls. Along with the other eight Arcane Pedestals I had you make, you should be able to add a bit of stability to your future Infusions. Be sure to consult the Thauminomicon page on the Infusion Altar!
    You now have a whole lot of new Researches branching off the Infusion one. For introduction, we'll make something I feel will be quite useful and stylish where you are : Boots of the Traveler. Go ahead and research it, and start gathering the components. The shards, fish, Enchanted Cloth, Leather Boots, and Feather are simple to gather. The more difficult part is gathering the Iter and Volatus Essentia. I highly suggest you take a peak at a simple Boat and some chicken Feathers.
    When you have the Essentia needed in Warded Jars, go over to your Infusion Altar. Place the Leather Boots in the center Pedestal, then the other components on the Pedestals on the outside. You need to keep a balance of items : an item placed on a North pedestal needs to have an item placed on a South pedestal. If there are an odd number of items, then one item will have an empty pedestal opposite it. Make sure each item is placed correctly, then place the Warded Jars within 10 blocks of the Altar. When everything is in place, Right Click your Wand on the Runic Matrix. Watch the Infusion carefully. If an item pops off its Pedestal instead of getting absorbed, quickly put it back on!

betterquesting.name: The World Next Door
betterquesting.desc:
Through careful study and some mystical hints scattered through some of the magic of these flowers and constructions, we've discovered there is a world right next to yours, just sliiightly out of alignment. Another race of creatures used to live in your current world, but do not any longer. I think we can contact them with the power of Botania magic! I've written down how to make all the items you'll need in the Lexica Botania.
    On pages like the Alfheim Portal, you can have it display the multiblock in the world so you know where to place items! Also, don't forget, to keep the portal open requires a constant stream of Mana! I don't think you'll have enough power to send much once you construct and open the gate, but... wait, throw your Lexica Botania in first, then a block of Living Wood to show that you've learned some of their knowledge!

betterquesting.name: Automated Purchasing
betterquesting.desc: We've devised a new way for you to purchase materials from the shop: The Automated way of course!     You can take one of these blank Order Forms and craft it with any of the Ores you can purchase in this Hardware Store. It will imprint the Ore onto the Order Form, and then you can craft the Order Form again to multiply it.                           Then simply use your handy EnderIO Alloy Smelter to combine it with the appropriate amount of Shop Vouchers.

betterquesting.name: Awaken the Power
betterquesting.desc:
Now that we can summon Ender Dragons to fight when we want, and harvest their powerful Hearts of energy, we can further our Draconic research!
    I've compiled some new research notes on a Ritual that will imbue the power of a Dragon Heart into Charged Draconic Blocks, Awakening their power. To contain the power of the Awakening Ritual, you'll need to fully charge a Draconium Block. Send me 4 Draconic Cores to show me you are prepared for the Ritual. I'll send them right back.
    Gather these materials and show them to me. I'm still compiling my notes into a book for you, for now consult the tablet from the Safety Match research.

betterquesting.name: Re-Awaken The Dragon
betterquesting.desc:
We've found if you put a Block of Draconium into any RF charger machine or Capacitor, it will absorb RF Energy. When it absorbs 1 Million RF, it... changes. It becomes a Charged Draconium Block, teeming with stored energy.
    We've done some extensive testing here, and called in a few of those Dragons I mentioned before, one of them from the Blood Magic labs. He helped us create a ritual to summon yourself an Ender Dragon, one more powerful than the one located in The End in your world.
    Killing creatures with a Wyvern or other Draconic weapon can sometimes sever their soul from their body. You can use four of them and some other materials to create a Resurrection Stone. 
    Then, send me one of the Charged Draconium Blocks to show me that you have the capability to power up one. The Tablet from the Safety Match research should show you how to do this ritual.

betterquesting.name: Special Research
betterquesting.desc:
The Ferret Business conducts all sorts of research, from Food and Health to Weapons and Armor. Many of these researches are very expensive and volatile, and new Assistants must earn the ability to aid in these Special Researches.
    To gain access to the Special Research division, you will need to reach the following :
      Job Reputation : Researcher
      Shop Loyalty : Bronze Tier
      Trader Rank : Entrepreneur
    CEO Caigan heads the Special Research division, and he feels you have great promise!

betterquesting.name: Redeem Silver Job Chip
betterquesting.desc:
§3§lJob Chips§r are earned by assisting in Research, or submitting Research Materials.
    By combining two of the same value, you get a larger §lChip§r. The larger the §lChip§r you redeem, the more §2§lJob Reputation§r it is worth. Four §3§lBronze Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lSilver Chip§r. Four §3§lSilver Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lThaumium Chip§r, and so on.
    You will receive 12 §2§lSilver Coins§r.§r

betterquesting.name: Awakened Multitool
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Having a good set of tools on your belt is fantastic, but when you are battling Ender Dragons and other monsterous boss-like creatures, you need that belt space for other tools and items. Like healing potions, or building materials.
    In consideration of that, we've come up with a very useful multitool for you, which combines the usefulness of a Pickaxe,  Shovel, and Sword into one single tool!
    To make the amazing Draconic Staff of Power, we'll need the three base tools from you, as well as some other materials too

betterquesting.name: Redeem Gold Job Chip
betterquesting.desc:
§3§lJob Chips§r are earned by assisting in Research, or submitting Research Materials.
    By combining two of the same value, you get a larger §lChip§r. The larger the §lChip§r you redeem, the more §2§lJob Reputation§r it is worth. Four §3§lBronze Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lSilver Chip§r. Four §3§lSilver Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lThaumium Chip§r, and so on.
    You will receive 26 §2§lSilver Coins§.§r and 1 §2§lBasic Blind Bag of Blind Bags.§r

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: A Creature Feature
betterquesting.desc:
Being mostly on your own over there, dealing with creatures and animals can be a daunting task, I bet. Especially when you need to lead a pair of animals home to start a farm. And by lead, I of course, mean drag, coerce, bribe, shout at, and pray the animals follow you and don't get themselves killed. Well, usually thats what we'd have to do, but since we started experimenting with materials from your world, we've discovered some things that should be quite helpful!
    Safari Nets are basically a magical version of those big game hunter nets you see, the ones you throw over a creature to tangle them up. Instead, though, this encapsulates them into a handheld item! There are two versions, a cheap one-use version, and a Reusable version!
    Jailer's Safari Nets are an even more magical version of Safari Nets. We've noticed a tendancy for animals from your world to up and vanish, especially monsters, but any creature released by a Jailer's Net will 99 percent of the time stick around. A Golden Jailer's Safari Net will also give the creature it releases a fancy nameplate! Spiffy!
    Oh right! Trying to catch a creature in a dangerous area? Use this Safari Net Launcher!
    We've retooled a custom Breeder machine to consume Essence. By supplying the Auto-Spawner with Essence, Power, and any creature caught in a reusable Safari Net, you can create clones! You can either choose for it to spawn the same kind of creature, or exact copies of the creature you caught. Exact copies take much more Essence, though.
    We've discovered a way to convert you own, well... worldly Experience into Essence. By using this and having empty Buckets in your inventory, you can convert XP into Essence for various MFR machines.

display:10.Name:8: Good Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: QUEST TABLET FIRMWARE UPDATE
betterquesting.desc:
Greetings, §3§lBandit§r! Your §lQ.U.E.S.T. Tablet§r is a constantly evolving piece of hardware. But without a constant WiFi connection to our servers, it cannot easily update its firmware for new, exciting changes!
    But, you can easily update it when an §4§l§nUPDATE§r happens by checking the box to the right and hitting Claim below. It will update the firmware for you.
------------------------------------------
§l§nCURRENT FIRMWARE VERSION§o§r : 0.2.5 BETA V2
------------------------------------------
§o    Better Questing does not automatically update older worlds when the default quest database updates.
    This quest lets you reset it within the QUEST Tablet, or you can simply run /bq_admin default load yourself.

rewards.command: /say VAR_NAME updated the QUEST Tablet firmware to v0.2.5 Beta V2

betterquesting.name: The Core
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Our research has been requiring more and more RF Energy to harness the power of Draconium, so we've had to make a few side projects to expand our research into new technology.
    This side tangent has become amazingly evolutionary in the field of Energy Storage! With this, we can store not just millions, but BILLIONS, even Trillions, of RF Energy!
    There is way more to it than I can explain over the QUEST Tablet. I am rewriting the documentation I came up with. For now, consult the tablet you can get from the Safety Matches research.

betterquesting.name: Crystal Network
betterquesting.desc:
Now that you are working with massive amounts of power, we wnated to figure out a way to distribute it in a large area without using cables or conduits, since those take up a lot of room.
    What we've come up with is a network based on Crystals, transmitting the RF Energy wirelessly between them. Each crystal has a range and a maximum number of other crystals they can connect to, so you'll need to chain crystals together to go farther distances.
    The primary tool you use to bind crystals together into a network is the Crystal Binder. It has multiple modes you can switch between by Shift + Right Clicking it. As long as you are holding the Crystal Binder, you can see all the connections between nearby Crystals. You can switch modes by holding the Crystal Binder and doing Shift + Right Click. 
    The basic crystal is the Energy Relay. It cannot send or receive energy from a block, its whole purpose is to connect Crystals in the network. You'll primarily use it to go further distances or as a connection hub.
      Range : 25
      Max Connections : 10
    The Energy Tranceiver is the crystal you'll use to give or take RF Energy from a block. Place it on the side of any RF machine or otherwise, and Bind the crystal to the network. Then change your Crystal Binder to Mode Change and use it on the Tranceiver to switch it between Input and Output mode.
      Range : 25
      Max Connections : 2
    The Energy Relay and Tranceivers have Advanced versions you can craft. These double the range and number of connections they can have.
    The Wireless Tranceiver enables you to cut down not only on cables, but on using many Crystals in your energy net. You do not need to hook a Tranceiver up to the side of a block anymore to transfer energy to and from it. To bind a machine to the Energy Net, first use the Crystal Binder in Bind Mode on the Wireless Tranceiver, then on the machine.
      Range : 25
      Wireless Range : 15 
      Max Connections : 3
      Max Wireless Connections : 8
    As before, the Advanced Version will double all of these limits.

betterquesting.name: Round the World
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    The power of Awakened Draconium, when combined with the very essence of Dragons themselves, enable us to make a very special device. One that can control time itself! This item requires us to obtain some... quite dangerous materials from Ender Dragons. Materials that are super fragile as well. Thus, the cost is... a bit extreme.
    The Sun Dial, when a Redstone Signal is applied to it, will charge up, and then fire into the sky. Time will then fast forward, not stopping until you stop the Redstone Signal.
    This will only affect the placement of the sun itself, it will not fast forward time for your crops or machines.

betterquesting.name: Penultimate Research
betterquesting.desc:
Greetings, Bandit. it has been a while since I last contacted you. I am Caigan, CEO of The Ferret Business. I'm extremely pleased at all the progress you've done! It has really helped us improve so many things, get new products on the market, and learn way more about teleportation technology than we've thought possible.
    Unfortunately, this has not lead us to a way to get you home. Discover new dimensions and travel to and from them? Sure, we can do that now. Teleport large distances on the same world with very little cost? Yes, we can do that now too thanks to you.
    But... your predicament has stumped all of our researchers and myself. I've taken a personal interest in you, and have created a small team with my very best researchers. I feel the only way to get you home is to delve into the more... mythical... approaches.
    Our research does not come free. The materials for this are very rare, and I'm going to have to scour some obscure locations for them. But I will give you this for the initial investment. May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out.
    Sorry, I always wanted to use that quote! Here, this Safety Match is the first step in my research. It may look like a normal match, but it will create a fire that burns hot, but does not spread. Each match only ignites one fire, but if you put 9 of them together into a Matchbox, you mystically get way more fires!

betterquesting.name: A Core of Power
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    We need a good way to harness the strength and power of Draconium. One of my researchers suggested that we could shape the metal into a mystical symbol, like a medal.
    The mystical nature of the shape helps to contain the power into what we are calling a basic Draconium Core.
    There isn't much you can do with a basic Draconic Core, but if you combine four of them with a Nether Star, you get a much more poweful item we call a Wyvern Core.
    Both of these are key components in Energy Cores, which will be needed for further research.

betterquesting.name: Redeem Enderium Job Chip
betterquesting.desc:
§3§lJob Chips§r are earned by assisting in Research, or submitting Research Materials.
    By combining two of the same value, you get a larger §lChip§r. The larger the §lChip§r you redeem, the more §2§lJob Reputation§r it is worth. Four §3§lBronze Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lSilver Chip§r. Four §3§lSilver Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lThaumium Chip§r, and so on.
    You will receive 614 §2§lSilver Coins§.§r and 1 §2§lGreat Blind Bag of Blind Bags.§r

display:10.Name:8: Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Wyvern Battery
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    The Wyvern Energy Core and the power of the Wyvern Tools has shown that we can harness Draconium to store RF Energy in massive amounts.
    We are currently persuing this line of research, and the first thing we've come up with for you is the Wyvern Flux Capacitor, which works much like the other Flux Capacitors you may know of.
    Though, I think comparing them is like comparing an AA Battery to a Car Battery... The Wyvern Flux Capacitor can hold 80 MILLION RF Energy, which is great because Wyvern Tools are very power hungry.

betterquesting.name: Creature Feature
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    You may have noticed, if you've been using your Wyvern weapons, that very rarely, a tiny version of a creature you slaughter will pop out of their corpse.
    This, we've found, is a miniature version of that creature's Soul. The simplest thing you can do with this Soul is to Shift + Right Click it on the ground to summon another of that creature, but this consumes the soul.
    Thanks to some study by the Draconic researchers here, we've discovered you can use a Draconic Core on any Mob Spawner in your world to 'stabilize it', enabling you to move it around by breaking it with a Draconic tool. 
    You can then place it and Right Click a Mob Soul onto it to have that Stabilized Mob Spawner start spawning that creature. Various items will improve the Mob Spawner when you Right Click them onto it :
      Wyvern Core : Tier 2 Upgrade
      Awakened Core : Tier 3 Upgrade
      Nether Star : Removes requiring a player within 16 blocks.
      Notch Apple : Removes spawning restrictions (light, etc)
    When you break a Stabilized Mob Spawner, you will get back all the upgrades EXCEPT the Mob Soul.
    To help with your new ability to summon a large amount of creatures, we've come up with a Mob Grinder. The Mob Grinder is a special machine that will kill creatures in a 7x7 area in front of it. It can be powered with normal furnace Fuel, or with RF Energy.

betterquesting.name: Redeem Manyullyn Job Chip
betterquesting.desc:
§3§lJob Chips§r are earned by assisting in Research, or submitting Research Materials.
    By combining two of the same value, you get a larger §lChip§r. The larger the §lChip§r you redeem, the more §2§lJob Reputation§r it is worth. Four §3§lBronze Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lSilver Chip§r. Four §3§lSilver Chips§r are worth less than a single §3§lThaumium Chip§r, and so on.
    You will receive 1,300 §2§lSilver Coins§.§r and 1 §2§lEpic Blind Bag of Blind Bags.§r

display:10.Name:8: Epic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Dislocated Existance
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    We're starting to delve into more teleportation research using Draconium. We have some promising starts so far!
    The first thing we have come up with is a self teleporter. We call it a Charm of Dislocation. It has limited uses before it breaks, but it seems to be able to 'record' the spot you are standing at, and then later you can use the Charm to teleport right back to that spot.
    It seems this Charm can be used about 10 times before it breaks apart. I wonder if we can bolster the energy in it somehow to make it a bit more lasting...

betterquesting.name: Dislocational Control
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Delving deeper into the teleportation research, we've found a way to compress the power of the Charm of Dislocation and improve on it.
    The improvements on the Charm of Dislocation are amazing! You can now use it to record multiple locations and choose between them. Just like the normal Charm, it can record your current position, dimension, and direction facing.
    The Enhanced Charm of Dislocation utilizes the power of Ender Pearls to enhance its teleportation abilities. You can feed it Ender Pearls via the interface.
    This also has the improved benefit of unlimited uses... as long as you power it properly!

betterquesting.name: [ADMIN] SCOREBOARD AND PROGRESS RESET
betterquesting.desc:
§oWith 0.2.2, the Scoreboard function is no longer used to avoid a serious crash issue with Better Questing.

Players should either use this quest, or use the following commands to clear the scoreboard and reset their questing progress properly. The item is only obtainable with commands, or Mod/OP status. §4§l

NOTE THAT USING THIS QUEST METHOD WILL SOFT CRASH YOUR GAME. YOU CAN LOAD BACK INTO THE WORLD IMMEDIATELY.

IT IS SUGGESTED YOU USE THE COMMANDS BELOW INSTEAD.§r§o§r

/scoreboard objectives remove Job_Reputation
/scoreboard objectives remove Trader_Renown
/scoreboard objectives remove Shop_Rank
/bq_admin reset all playername
(replace playername with your Minecraft name!)

betterquesting.name: Catwalks
betterquesting.desc:
Now, when I'm building something, I know I have trouble reaching high ceilings, rooftops, or more. Ladders are only so useful (I swear, they are out for blood if I ever try going DOWN them...), and Jetpacks are finicky indoors and use fuel. I COULD make a pole out of some random material like some kind of nerd (A strange creature Explorer Erin brought back last year. We don't talk about it now...).
    Instead, large construction projects usually require something easily set up and torn down. Something easily modified and expanded depending on the project. And to that, here at The Ferret Business, we use...Catwalks!
    There are a variety of Catwalks we use, each one easily modifiable and torn down when done with. To start with, you'll need a handy dandy Blowtorch, and some of these simple to make Steel Grates, which are most of the structure of the Catwalks.

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Dragon Cube
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Draconium itself is fairly expensive, but since you've done a lot for The Business, you've probably got a lot of Trade Vouchers available, right? Well, to save you hitting buttons again and again in your QUEST Tablet, you can purchase a Block of Draconium with a single purchase. It doesn't change how much it costs or how much Loyalty you earn, but it saves clicking so much!

betterquesting.name: Dragon Gate
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    We've learned that we can take some Draconium Dust and mix it into some Obsidian with the help of some Blaze Powder. The resultant material is fairly strong, strong enough to resist the destructive nature of some powerful creatures such as the Wither.
    Further research into this Draconium Infused Obsidian shows that you can make a Portal with it, quite similar to the Obsidian portal you can make to reach the Nether. You'll need a Dislocator Receptical though as part of the frame, and you can use a Dislocation Charm to set the destination.

betterquesting.name: A Guide to Contracts
betterquesting.desc: Whether its Materials or Products, The Ferret Business is always in need of them massive quantities. We have stores and distributors all over the place, and we need a steady supply to meet the demand, so we have a standard listing of Contracts.                         Contracts cover all manner of things we accept. The simplest contracts are Supply Contracts, which cover basic materials like metal and seeds. There are also Production Contracts, which cover anything you can mass produce from materials, like furniture, toys, or even RF Energy.                         But to fill any contract, you need to start by making Shipping Crates. Surround a Silver Coin in any Wooden Planks to get 64 servicable shipping crates.      NOTE : Once you crate something, you cannot uncrate it!                      I will give you 64 crates for 1 plank of wood. Normally, you can create more crates, simply by combining 8 planks of wood and a single Silver Coin.                            Originally I would give you a guidebook, but the printer here is broken right now...

betterquesting.desc: Tanzanite is a relatively 'new' gem, which can appear to be different colors under different light conditions.

betterquesting.name: Improved Wandcraft
betterquesting.desc:
Now that you have an Infusion Altar, you can vastly increase the power of both your Wands and the Foci you use with them. You are starting to get into more and more powerful Thaumaturgy, so you'll want your Wand to match. Your basic wands can only take you so far. I also highly suggest improving the Stability of your Infusion Altar. Wiggle helped me set up a grid of Candles and Skulls underneath it, for example. 
    You can find all these researches on the Thaumaturgy tab.
    To improve the Wand Caps for our Wands, we're going to have to do a bit more than just shape them in an Arcane Worktable. You'll need to infuse some Aspects and materials with your Infusion Altar as well to get the most out of them. Charged Silver Caps are very good at channeling the four Primal Aspects (Aer, Ignis, Aqua, Terra). Charged Thaumium Caps are good at working with all types of Vis.
    There are six researches off the Greatwood Wand Core you can outright pay Research Points for : Bone Rod, Blazing Rod, Reed Rod, Obsidian Rod, Icy Rod, and Quartz Rod. Each of these specialized Wand Cores corresponds to one of the six core Aspects. These Cores also hold more Vis than a Greatwood Wand. They each have a special property as well : If their Vis type ever drops below 10%, they will slowly generate more. For example, a Blazing Rod will renegerate Ignis, while an Icy Rod will regenerate Aqua.
    Greatwood and specialized Wands are much better than that Iron and Wood thing you started with, yeah? Well, how about we go the next step up? Silverwood Trees have great magical properties, so turning their wood into a Silverwood Rod is only logical. It will give you double the Vis capacity of a normal Greatwood Wand, which will open up the doors to bigger pieces of Thaumaturgy!

betterquesting.name: Walking Above
betterquesting.desc:
Scaffolds and Catwalks are excellent for aiding in building for a few reasons. Like I said before, they are easy to make, easy to tear down, and customizable.
    To start with, Scaffolds help get you to high places. If you Sneak + Right Click a Scaffold onto one side of an existing Scaffold, it will add it to the OTHER side. You can extend a line of Scaffolds out this way!
    The sides of Scaffolds also act like Ladders, but not ordinary ones! You climb up them faster, sure, but you also don't slide back down them like normal. To go down the side of a Scaffold, use Sneak. This lets you hang onto the side of a Scaffold to build or work on something, instead of requiring a flat platform to stand on.
    When you have Scaffolds up to the height you want, you can then use Catwalks. You can usually place the first Catwalk down under your feet, which sets up the railings around you. These are higher than you can normally jump (for safety reasons!). You can then extend out the Catwalk by simply Right Clicking another Catwalk against the inside railing in the direction you want to go. You can keep Right Clicking to extend the Catwalk out even further without moving this way as well.
    When you have the Catwalks built out to where you want, you can then Sneak + Right Click a Scaffold at the floor of a Catwalk to place it underneath. Right Click the Blowtorch on the floor to to remove the Catwalk's floor, then you can extend the Scaffold out normally.
    Right Clicking a Blowtorch on one of the railings will remove it, enabling you to drop off the side, or reach a non-catwalk platform you have.

display:10.Name:8: Good Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Good Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: ReplaceMe9
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Better Access
betterquesting.desc:
Builder's Scaffolds work similarly to normal Scaffolds except one bonus : If you Right Click any other block onto the Scaffold, it swaps it out. This is a great way to lay out a lot of Scaffolds as placeholder material you can climb and then replace them with the proper building materials. You can either craft Builder's Scaffolds, or Right Click a placed Scaffold with your Blowtorch to swap between Builders and normal.
    Placing Scaffolds as ladders to get down from your Catwalks is all well and good, but it can get dangerous. Instead, you can use these Caged Ladders to create a path down. Right Click one onto the floor of a Catwalk to place it underneath, then a Blowtorch to remove the Catwalk floor. You can then Sneak + Right Click more Caged Ladders downward back to the floor. Caged Ladders work just like climbing or decending Scaffolds, just note you'll need to use your Blowtorch to cut an opening to get out at the bottom of the Ladder.
    Support Columns work similarly to Scaffolds, but are more for looks than use. You can climb them, but they are much slower than a normal Ladders.

Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: ReplaceMe12
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Bones of Dragons
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[Be sure to open your TFB Corporate Catalog with Draconium Ingots in your inventory!]§r
    The initial idea for my train of research was some of the data I gathered from your world. Specifically, the place you call The End is (or was?) home to a creature of legend : a Dragon. If it exists in your world, surely it exists in others?
    Sure, we have two legged dragons walking about The Business sometimes (they are especially insightful into magical research), but they are nothing like their ancient, mythical ancestors.
    My research thus far has unconvered what the ancient people called The Bones of Dragons : a mystical metal that is some of the strongest, most magical we've ever seen.
    Thanks to some fairly dangerous research, my team is able to create this metal. Only in tiny batches, and with very expensive ingredients, but we've stockpiled enough to start selling it to you. Both to help us with costs, and to have you utilize it for more research. You can purchase more Draconium Ingots in your TFB Corporate Catalog after you obtain some!
    There are a few things you can do with Draconium, but my suggestion? Make some Tinker's Tools with it, you won't be disappointed!

betterquesting.name: ReplaceMe13
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Tools of the Wyvern
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Draconium is a fantastic material, able to tap into and utilize so much potential power and magic. Hopefully we can unlock its secrets, and it will guide us to getting you out of there, and open up even more doors for all of us.
    Shaping it into Cores was an excellent first step, and we've been able to expand upon it. You can make more powerful Cores of varying types just by combining a few together with other powerful materials.
    We've created some powerful lab equipment that enables us to empower some basic tools with Draconic potential : We simply call them Wyvern Tools. Why? Wyverns were, according to some lore, Lesser Dragons. They were Draconic in nature, but not to the mystical levels of full Dragons.
    Don't underestimate Wyverns though, as these tools are extremely powerful in their own right. The machinery to create them is expensive, not to mention the other magical materials we need to harness the energy.

betterquesting.name: Customized Railings
betterquesting.desc:
Catwalks have a few ways you can improve them. Things like Caution Tape can be Right Clicked onto a Catwalk to add warning tape to it.
    As well, Right Clicking some Rope Lights onto a Catwalk will light them up for you. Great when you don't have interior lighting installed yet!
    Sneak + Right Clicking an empty hand on a Catwalk with either customization will remove it.

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: A Different Kind of Rail
betterquesting.desc:
Catwalks and Scaffolds aren't the only thing you can construct up high. Sturdy Rails enable you to build suspended minecart tracks. 
    When you place down one of these Sturdy Rails, you can Right Click a rail on top of it to extend the rail forward. If you Sneak + Right Click the top of a Rail, it will place one above it, and then connect and create a ramp upwards. Likewise, Sneak + Right Clicking on the underside of a rail will place and create a ramp downward. You will need to break one of the rails to clear the path, however.
    Any of the Rails that use Redstone, you can Right Click with a Blowtorch to toggle it on or off.

display:10.Name:8: Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Crystal Tools
betterquesting.desc:
--------
    §k........§rs Certus Quar§k.......§rng? There a§k.........§ro with §k..........§r cables you can §k.........§r strong§k....§r Anchor solid handho§k..........§r ladder!
    Not en§k..........§rsome tools §k.....§r instead. A useful §k......§r Wrench, whi§k......§r dealing with §k....§r machines§k.....§rget the Quartz Knife§k......§r cutting§k......§r take any Iron In§k......§r Inscriber Name Plat§k.......§rtz can make a sharp Sword §k...§r Pickaxe or Shovel.
    §k....§r liquids §k.......§rur Certus Quartz Tank §k......§ry temp§k.....§r lava to cryothemum!
    §k.....§r Charged Certus Quartz Fixtures l§k.....§rd light up the area n§k........§r
    §k.....§r light sensitive§k..........§r Light Detecting Fixture §k......§r Redstone Signal §k.....§r light level §k.......§r
    §k.......§r ME Cables §k.....§r lighting §k....§rIlluminated Panels §k......§r variety §k....§r place them on any ME Cab§k.......§r
--------
    Dataologist Dante : The scrambled sections appear to be a lot larger.
    Linguist Larry : Does that mean the signal is getting weaker?
    Dataologist Dante : The equipment says otherwise. Maybe we're just not translating something properly?
    Linguist Larry : Could be. Let's see... sounds like its talking about those cables we've been working on. And some Certus Quartz Tools?
    Dataologist Dante : Yeah, I recognize mention of a Wrench and a Knife. Those are pretty easy to make... there. 
    Linguist Larry : Nice, handy skill there. That Wrench looks as solid as any other machine Wrench. How'd you learn to make those so fast?
    Dataologist Dante : Kit Scouts and survival training. 
    Linguist Larry : Interesting! That knife looks really sharp. Here, it said something about working with Iron. Oh, hey. It cut it like butter. 
    Dataologist Dante : Hm, it said the cables were strong handholds? Here, these rods look about right, so... Hey, no kidding. These Cable Anchors plug right into the sides of the ME Cable and can be climbed.
    Linguist Larry : Uh, let's not push our luck. Hop down, I don't want you falling onto the table covered in sharp Quartz or anything.
    Dataologist Dante : Right, right. Hm, looks like I can cut an Iron Ingot another way by Right Clicking the Quartz Knife. A cut here, a shave here and... 
    Linguist Larry : A plate with your name on it... oh! An Inscriber Name Plate, perfect size for the Inscriber. Nice.
    Dataologist Dante : Yep, looks like we can make tools with either Certus Quartz or Nether Quartz. 
    Linguist Larry : Certus Quartz is probably sturdier. It's still surprising me.
    Dataologist Dante : Looks like its sturdy enough to make a liquid tank that can hold even lava. 
    Linguist Larry :  And cryoth... cry... that super cold liquid. I can never remember the name. 
    Dataologist Dante : Me either, its a mouthful. What else do we have... ah, some light based tools. A light fixture?
    Linguist Larry : Yeah, looks sort of like a new age torch sconce or something. And THAT sounds like a Daylight Sensor in a way.
    Dataologist Dante : The Light Detecting Fixture, not really an inventive name, but at least its clear. I think I like the sound of the Illuminated Panels the best, since they sit on the ME Cables.
    Linguist Larry : Agreed. And... Dante?
    Dataologist Dante : Yes?
    Linguist Larry : What's that?
    Dataologist Dante : Oh, um... I was testing the Quartz Dust and made a Tiny TNT thing. Smaller boom, but still a boom.
    Linguist Larry : What is this, TNT for ants?
    Dataologist Dante : ...really?

display:10.Name:8: Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Quantum Bridge
betterquesting.desc:
--------
    §k.§r bridge two§k....§r Networks §k...§r by §k...§r Utilize the Quantum Network Bridge!
    §k.....§r start§k..§r a Singularity! The Matter Condensor can compress §k...§r to create §k..§r take it, and some special Ender Dust §k.....§r Quartz Grindstone§k...§r place them in a blast-resistant chamber §k..§r Tiny TNT, to activate it§k......§r a pair of Quantum Entangled Singularities§k.......§r share the same spatial signature§k....§r
    §k.......§r create the §k...§r interface on the two networks §k......§r a 3x3 ring of ME Quantum Ring blocks, then §k.....§r an ME Quantum Link Chamber in the center.§k...§r both §k...§r connected and powered §k..§r must connect to the sides, not the corners§k.....§r inserting the linked Quantum Entangled Singularities §k....§rChamber.
    §k...§r only §k..§r one ME Controller between §k....§r networks. §k.....§r one side loses power§k...§r will drain power §k..§r to reestablish the connection.
--------
    Dataologist Dante : Now these blueprints...amazing.
    Linguist Larry : Wait, making a pocket sized quantum singularity? Isn't that...dangerous?
    Dataologist Dante : It doesn't look like it. The Matter Condensor appears to create a stable Singularity, not big enough to be catastrophic, but just big enough to transmit data through.
    Linguist Larry : Which is what the ME Network is, data storage. I see!
    Dataologist Dante : The Singularity needs to be activated though. I already built an Obsidian blasting chamber for that, see? Drop a Singularity, an Ender Dust from the Grindstone, and then set off one of these Tiny TNT's we got the blueprint for earlier.
    Linguist Larry : Now those are pretty. It splits into two? And the transmission says they are linked now...uh...I see you have a box full of these. How do you know which ones are linked?
    Dataologist Dante : Er...
    Linguist Larry : Here, use the Anvil to name them. 
    Dataologist Dante : Good idea. Okay, we got that sorted. Now we build the interface between two networks. A 3x3 of ME Quantum Ring blocks, but the center is an ME Quantum Link Chamber. Oooh, as soon as I put the Link Chamber in, it all transformed and connected. 
    Linguist Larry : Cool. I got my end set up as well. Hooked to ME Network, lots of power available...now we place the linked Quantum Entangled Singularities into the center of each and...ahaaano. It's not working?
    Dataologist Dante : Oops, we both have an ME Controller. Okay, disconnected mine. Looks like its working now.
    Linguist Larry : Excellent. It looks cool and is super useful. Form AND function.

display:10.Name:8: Epic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Epic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Tunnels, Dictionaries, and Security
betterquesting.desc:
--------
    §k.....§r transfer items, fluids, power, and redstone §k......§r network from point to point §k....§rnted P2P Tunnel system§k.....§r use §k...§r Memory Card to set up the input and output P2P Tunnels§k......§r transfer up to 32 channels §k.............§r in expanding your ME Network!
    §k....§r protect §k....§r ME Network§k..§r ME Security Terminal is highly configurable permission §k.....§r gives full permission to the person who placed it§k...§r more users §k.....§r configured using Biometric Cards§k....§r Right Click the Card on the other person, or §k.....§r Sneak + Right Click to encode §k...§r  can then take the card §k..§r ME Security Terminal and configure §k........§r
    §k...§r we have a new pr§k.........§r ME Ore Dictionary Export Bus! Using the Ore Dictionary §k...§r system§k..§r export specific Ore Dictionary listings! By holding §k........§r can see what§k..§r listings an item is §k......§r an Asterisk (*) is a wildcard.
--------
    Dataologist Dante : Hm, an odd collection of blueprints in this transmission.
    Linguist Larry : Let me see...yeah. Tunnels, security, and dictionaries. Weird.
    Dataologist Dante : A lot of new words again for the lexicon, too. Can you make sense of the first items?
    Linguist Larry : No. I'm not sure how to use this...P2P Tunnel properly? It sounds super useful though.
    Dataologist Dante : Agreed. It looks like you can configure one as an input, and any number of others as an output, and transfer various things to them.
    Linguist Larry : Well, the translator does know the words for items, fluids, power, and redstone. I don't know if there is other things beyond that though.
    Dataologist Dante : Right, and something about a Memory Card to configure the Tunnels, and that the tunnels can transfer up to 32 channels between points. That would be really useful for large, complex ME Networks I think.
    Linguist Larry : I think the ME Security Terminal is easier to use and more useful, in my opinion. At least, when you have assistants and whatnot around like we do.
    Dataologist Dante : Well, it doesn't look like it stops someone from breaking physical components, but network permissions itself is good. Looks like it works off these Biometric Cards. Here, see? I just Right Clicked this one on you, and now it has your name and a symbol on it.
    Linguist Larry : Neat, so you just put it into the ME Security Terminal and configure permissions. What about general permissions?
    Dataologist Dante : I tested that. Just use a blank card when configuring settings.
    Linguist Larry : Okay, good to know...now another completely different thing, this ME Ore Dictionary Export Bus.
    Dataologist Dante : That is quite a mouthful. It's equally useful though. You type in the Ore Dictionary listing for the items you want. An asterisk is a wildcard, so ore* would export all ore dictionary listings that started with ore.
    Linguist Larry : Like oreLead or oreSilver. Handy.
    Dataologist Dante : Yep. Bandit, you can see what Ore Dictionary listings an item is under by holding Shift while looking at it in your inventory.

display:10.Name:8: Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Great Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Portable Storage
betterquesting.desc:
--------
    §k...§r on the go§k....§r a small range of Portable Storage Cells§k...§r these can be charged in the Charger, and accessed on the go§k.....§r be configured in a Cell Workbench §k..§r
    §k...§r Portable Storage Cell holds items.
    The ME Portable Fluid Cell and ME Portable Gas Cell §k.....§r more advanced§k.§r have input and output slots for the appropriate containers such as buckets §k....§r
--------
    Linguist Larry : Short, sweet, and to the point. And only minor parts of it are garbled. 
    Dataologist Dante : Agreed. Just some portable Storage Cells. Looks like they can be put into an ME Drive like normal, but see? You can materialize and store items into it on the go.
    Linguist Larry : Only thing it needs is to be charged up. That is pretty useful.

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Less Wires, More Data
betterquesting.desc:
--------
    Enhance §k...§r ME Network §k.....§r Wireless capability §k..§r our special Wireless Receiver!
    §k....§r install an ME Wireless Access Point §k...§r take a Wireless Terminal, charge it in a Charger, §k.....§r an ME Security Terminal §k...§rsame network. §k......§r grant the device access §k...§r takes power and has a short range.
    §k...§r enhance the Wireless Terminal by combining §k.....§r various ME Panels, such as the ME Fluid Terminal§k...§r will transform it into a Wireless Universal Terminal!
    §k......§r offer two specific Wireless Terminals : Fluid and Gas §k...§r
--------
    Linguist Larry : Wireless access? That sounds quite useful, especially out in the field.
    Dataologist Dante : Yeah. It doesn't have much range it looks like, but I bet theres a way to increase that.
    Linguist Larry : Hopefully. So we place an ME Wireless Access Point on the network, then connect the Wireless Terminal to it with the ME Security Terminal. 
    Dataologist Dante : That's good, a random assistant getting a Wireless Terminal doesn't mean that they instantly have access.
    Linguist Larry : Or some random passerby.
    Dataologist Dante : Exactly. And according to these blueprints, we can enhance the Wireless Terminal too. Get more than just item access by turning it into a Wireless Universal Terminal. 
    Linguist Larry : So you can just add multiple panels to a single Universal Terminal?
    Dataologist Dante : Looks like it. Or you can just make specific Gas and Fluid wireless terminals.

Good Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Large Order - Sushi
betterquesting.desc:
Sushi is always in high demand amongst the Ferret Business. It is a regular, highly popular item in our own cafeterias, and we specialize in speedy, one hour delivery in most major cities.
    Yes, this Large Order was created and approved specifically by the CEO. Why do you ask?

betterquesting.name: Delivery System
betterquesting.desc:
Crating various goods to ship to us is profitable, but thinking on the smaller scale. With the size of The Ferret Business, we are in constant need of large amounts of items, fluids, and more.
    To submit these things, we have a few special tools you can use, Bandit.
    The first is the Object Submission Station (OSS). Right Clicking it will bring up the interface, showing you all your current quests in which you submit items to us. Scroll through to find ones marked Large Order, hit the Checkmark to activate it, and you can use any piping system or move items into the OSS directly from your inventory. You can craft multiple OSS's to work on different tasks as well.
    The second is the RF Submission Station (RFSS). It works similarly, but is used specifically for RF Supply quests.

betterquesting.name: Simple Draconic Devices
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    Some initial research into the Draconic and Wyvern Cores has netted us some really interesting things.
    These might be of even more use down the line, but for now, everything we successfully make with Draconium evolves our knowledge just one step further.
    The first is a Particle Generator, which can be used to make pretty effects, though we think it can be used for much much more.
    The second thing we've come up with is a Weather Controller. Using Emeralds as a catalyst, you can control the weather in your world.
    The final thing we have is a low power, but useful, Generator to add to your plethora of ways to generate RF Energy.

betterquesting.name: Boosting Wireless

--------

    §k....§r install an ME Wireless Access Point §k...§r take a Wireless Terminal, charge it in a Charger, §k.....§r an ME Security Terminal §k...§rsame network. §k......§r grant the device access §k...§r takes power and has a short range.

betterquesting.name: Jingle Jingle Jangle Jingle
betterquesting.desc:
Dataologist Dante : Hey, Larry. I think I got a breakthrough on all these weirdly scrambled transmissions.
    Linguist Larry : Oh? How so?
    Dataologist Dante : Well, I brought it over to one of the other data labs and we spent a few hours analyzing the stream. We figured out that, hey, it looks like theres multiple transmissions going on at once and they sort of...clash. The transmission we've been decoding is the main one, but there's a lot of really short transmissions jumping through with it.
    Linguist Larry : Like piggybacking or something?
    Dataologist Dante : Yeah. He programmed up a filter for our decoder and translation computer. Installing it now.
    Linguist Larry : Finally, no more garbled messages.
    Dataologist Dante : Agreed. He was so happy to help he was giggling when he handed me the thumbstick.
    Linguist Larry : Eh? Giggling? That's weird.
    Dataologist Dante : We'd been at it for hours. Maybe just sleep drunk or something. Oh hey, there we go. Lets decode the most recent transmission...
--------
    Don't forget, ladies and §k....§r the limited time offer is still available! Get your own Wally the Walrus stuffed toy with every order §k...§r Storage Cells or more!
    
    §o LITTLE BO-PEEP §r
    §o HAS LOST HER IRON §r
    §o A KOBOLD §r
    §o THIEVED IT §r
    §o AS SHE EXPLORED §r
    §o HER ENVIRON §r
    §o§l DATA-SAVE §r
--------
    Dataologist Dante : ...what?
    Linguist Larry : ...try the next one.
--------
    Would ya look at that. §k...§r Jimmy loves his Wally the Walrus plush toy. You can get one §k...§r
    
    §o KEEP WELL §r
    §o AWAY FROM THE §r
    §o APPROACHING SHIPS §r
    §o KEEP YOUR DATA SAFE §r
    §o ON OUR §r
    §o SILICON CHIPS §r
    §o§l DATA-SAVE §r
--------
    Linguist Larry : ...the lexicon is almost complete already, Dante. It's working really fast now.
    Dataologist Dante : ...I don't even...I...what...
--------
    Each of these fantastic Wally the Walrus toys is numbered. There are only one million in existence folks. See, right on Wally's tail. It makes it one in a million.
    And, as a bonus, you get a variety of our fantastic products at fantastic prices. Isn't that...fantastic?
    
    §o IF YOU HAVE §r
    §o A MEGA CORP §r
    §o YOU'VE GOT §r
    §o MEGA REASONS §r
    §o TO BE USING §r
    §o§l DATA-SAVE §r
--------
    Linguist Larry : And lexicon complete...
    Dataologist Dante : ALREADY?
    Linguist Larry : Yeah...
    Dataologist Dante : I...advertising jingles. It was advertising jingles this entire time.
    Linguist Larry : I need a drink...

betterquesting.desc:
--------

    Worry no more! We have a line of high-end Storage Cells of all varieties!
    The 128 Cubed Storage Cell is enough to contain grand workshops.
    The Advanced Storage Housing can be used to make even bigger Cells, like the 4096k or 16384k Storage Cells.
    You can also get 4096k Fluid and Gas Storage Housings!

betterquesting.name: Large Order - Survival Generator
betterquesting.desc:
Not all things we order from factories are for selling. Survivalist Generators are fairly cheap, simple devices for generating power, but are far from robust enough to run entire shops or factories.
    What they ARE useful for is for aiding disaster struck areas. We are planning on sending these generators as part of Ferritarium Aid projects anywhere we can.

betterquesting.name: Compact Storage
betterquesting.desc:
The one thing I always have issue with is matching up form and function, such as with Chests or other storage items. Cardboard boxes while cheap, give off a certain vibe, while wooden chests give off a different feel. This isn't even touching on the function side of things, I've come across many storage solutions that look fantastic, but can barely hold a single antique store adventure!
    This is where I like to use Compact Storage! Using the Builder, you can customize the two most important aspects of either a Compact Chest or a Compact Backpack : The size and the color.
    Using HEX values (search online, theres a lot of color options!) in the upper right text box, the text will change to the color you have selected, or you can use the 4 premade options. Select the type of container you want in the lower right, and then input the required materials in the slots in the upper left.
    Then click the button and, voila, a custom container to your specifications!

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: Witches Oven
betterquesting.desc:
Ah, the §5§lWitches Oven§r. A decent tool at making §lcharcoal§r or §lcooking food§r, being a bit§l faster§r than a normal§l Furnace§r. And, if you believe the stories, good at cooking unfortunate§l children§r and/or poor confused§l Witches§r. 
    In reality, the §5§lWitches Oven§r's main purpose is capturing the §lmagical by-products§r of cooking specific things, such as§l Saplings§r and capturing their magical §lFumes§r. The book §5§lWitchcraft: Collecting Fumes§r can be a good aid.
    §5§lClay Jars§r are needed to capture the §lFumes§r. §5§lSoft Clay Jars§r must be §lfired§r in a §lFurnace§r or similar device, then placed into the §5§lWitches Oven§r in the §l§nBottom Center Slot§r.
    The main §lby-product§r of cooking §lSaplings§r is §5§lWood Ash§r, which can then be turned into §5§lQuicklime§r. Both will be useful later on.
    Cook §lOak Saplings§r to obtain §5§lExhale of the Horned One§r. You can then add it, an §lEgg§r, and a§l Mandrake Root§r to a boiling §lWitches Cauldron§r to create §5§lMutandis§r. 
    §5§lMutandis§r is the first and simplest bit of §lmagic§r a §lWitch§r can create with their §lWitches Cauldron§r. By §l§nRight Clicking§r it on certain §lplants§r, like §lSaplings§r or§l Grass§r, you can §lmutate§r it into another plant. Many §lrare§r and §lmagical plants§r can only be obtained with this method.
    The other §lcommon saplings§r can be cooked as well. §5§lBreath of the Goddess§r comes from §lBirch Saplings§r. §5§lHint of Rebirth§r from §lSpruce Saplings§r. §5§lFoul Fume§r from §lJungle Saplings§r. 
    If you do not have a certain §lsapling§r, you have the power now to §lmutate§r one magically using §5§lMutandis§r.

display:10.Name:8: Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags
Basic Blind Bag of Blind Bags

betterquesting.name: A Powerful Charge
betterquesting.desc:
§4§o[You can purchase this multiple times in the TFB Corporate Catalog]§r
    With the new crazy power system we've created, most of our charging stations just don't seem to cut it with the massive amounts of Energy we can move around.
    With further research, we've found a way to transfer power at a much higher rate with this machine. The Infuser charges items much faster than any other charger we have... I think. Its pretty amazing!
    With the massive amounts of RF we're dealing with, we've also begun looking into ways to better control the flow of it, and anything else. Gates are a good way to do this, and we have two we've made to deal with massive flow amounts : Flux Gate and Fluid Gate. When you place them down, the Input (Blue) face will always be towards you, with the Output (Orange) face being opposite.

betterquesting.name: Muta Muta Muta Muta
betterquesting.desc:
Now we shall expand a bit upon Mutandis, Bandit. If you've experimented with a little, you know it can cycle through many plants that you cannot find normally.
    There are three trees we as Witches are concerned with: §5§lRowan§r, §5§lHawthorn§r, and §5§lAlder§r. I suggest collecting at least a dozen of each§5§l Sapling§r before continuing, as well as Logs from each tree. The§5§l Rowan Tree§r leaves also drop§5§l Rowan Berries§r, which are usually acidic and somewhat poisonous... unless it is one you've obtained via§4§l Witchery§r, of course.
    As well, each of these §5§lSaplings§r can be cooked down in a Witches Oven for specific fumes : Rowan creates §5§lWhiff of Magic§r, Alder makes §5§lOdour of Purity§r, and Hawthorn makes §5§lReek of Misfortune§r.
    Do note that there is a side effect of planting and chopping down these three trees.§5§l Ents§r are animated spirits that can manifest at the death of one of these three trees; be sure to have an Axe on hand to protect yourself.§5§l Ent Twigs§r are quite useful to us as well, so be sure to collect some for later.
    Another plant Mutandis can cycle to is §5§lGlint Weed§r. This plant acts much like a Torch, though instead of being placed on walls, it can be placed on ceilings as well as the ground. The benefit is that if you plant§5§l Glint Weed§r on Dirt, Grass, or Sand, it will slowly multiply and spread.
    §5§lEmber Moss§r will spread much like §5§lGlint Weed §rif left alone on Grass or Sand. Be careful around it, though, as any creature that walks on it will be lit on fire.
    The last thing of concern for us is §5§lSpanish Moss§r. It grows much like Vines, hanging and extending itself downward as it grows. Unlike Vines, though, you cannot climb §5§lSpanish Moss§r. You will need Shears to harvest the §5§lSpanish Moss§r, so keep some handy child.
    Mutandis itself can be increased in potency by throwing it in a Witches Cauldron with a Netherwart. This creates §5§lMutandis Extremis§r, which can mutate many more plants, including Wheat and Cactus. You can also use it on Grass for a chance to change it into Mycellum, or on underwater Dirt to turn it into Clay.
    Both Mutandis and §5§lMutandis Extremis§r can be used to convert raw and cooked meat into other cooked meats. They can both also be used to convert Rotten Flesh into some semblance of§5§l Porkchops§r, though your appetite for mutated and cooked zombie flesh may relegate it to apocalypse food.
